column2: Found the Brotherhood of the Horse

Brotherhood of the Horse

Knight-Commander
Your Honour

To the [GetFromRootCompliment] [Root.GetBestName],

As your liege, I, [From.GetFullName], would like to name you a knight of [From.Title.GetName] in recognition of your prowess a warrior.

Signed, [From.GetBestName]
I accept your offer of knighthood, my liege.
I'm afraid I must refuse.
[From.GetBestName] kneels before you. You lightly touch a sword to both [From.GetHerHis] shoulders and, once [From.GetSheHe] swears the knightly vows, name them a knight of [Root.Title.GetFullName].
Arise, my knight.
You kneel before [From.GetTitledName] and swear your knightly vows. [From.GetTitledName] then orders your to rise and take your place as a knight of [From.Title.GetFullName].
I vow to serve you, my [From.GetLordLady].
Very well.

You have ordered the forming of the Brotherhood of the Horse, a chivalrous order of Knights under the authority of Stormwind. One of your houseshold knights, [horse_commander.GetBestName] has been granted the title of Knight-Commander in the Brotherhood.
For Stormwind!

The [From.GetRulerTitle] of Stormwind, [From.GetBestName], has order the creation of a knightly order: the Brotherhood of the Horse. These knights are sworn to Stormwind, and are unified under a structured and hierarchical organization.
Interesting.
Due to the current circumstances, the Brotherhood of the Horse has been disbanded.
... very well.

Due to the current circumstances, the Ravenguard has been disbanded.

Due to the current circumstances, the Wolfpack has been disbanded.
[From.GetBestName] has sent by [From.GetHerHis] family to be educated in in the chivalric arts at your order.
[From.GetFirstName] has returned from the knightly order, apparently having dropped out for some reason or another.
Send [Root.GetFirstName] to the knights
Send [Root.GetFirstName] to the realm's knightly order for training.
Celebrate Hallow's End
Start the celebration of Hallow's End, inviting all your realm to participate.
Today marks the start of Hallow's End, the celebration at the end of the year's last harvest.
Holding Hallow's End
Will of the Forsaken
Today marks the start of Hallow's End, the celebration at the end of the year's last harvest.
Today marks the start of Hallow's End, the celebration of your freedom from the grasp of the Scourge.
As part of Hallow's End, many celebrants put on masks and costumes and roam the streets, partying.
Put on a mask and join them!
What a silly thing to do.
It is customary for merchants and farmers to sell their wares during the celebrations, and shops have been set all over town.
Let's see what they have for sale.
I don't care.
Stupid commoners, clogging the streets with stalls!
It has become something of a tradition for spooky stories to be recounted in front of an audience, to both their amusement and horror.
A headless horseman? Tell me more!
The time has come to burn the wickerman and bring Hallow's End to a close. You are expected to make a speech before burning the wickerman. What shall you speak of?
Speak of tradition and duty.
Speak of the harvest and winter.
Speak of determination and tenacity.
Speak of vengeance and wrath.
Try to make up a speech.
Speak of futility and endings.
The time has come to burn the wickerman and bring Hallow's End to a close. [From.GetTitledName] expected to make a speech before burning the wickerman. You await for [From.GetHerHim] to start.

You speak of tradition, of duty. Of staying true to your roots and standing tall against those who would destroy all you cherish. To face the monsters of the world with courage and honour, as befits all humans.

You speak of the harvest and the importance of the peasantry to the realm. You also speak of the coming winter and the time of reflections it brings. It is time to cast sorrow and regrets aside, lest you take them into it.
You speak of how alone the forsaken are, of how it seems the entire world is out to get you. And that, despite this, you need to keep going. Through determination, through will, you will prevail.

You speak of how hate of the world for your people. Of how they treat you like monsters. Of the Scourge that sought to enslave you. You remind your listeners that vengeance will be yours, and none shall stand in your way.
You attempt to make a speech, only to stutter and stand in awkward silence, at a loss for words.
You speak of how meaningless everything is, of how life sometimes seems like you are just rushing headlong into oblivion, and nothing you will ever do matters.
Burn the wickerman.

[From.GetTitledName] speaks of tradition, of duty. Of staying true to your roots and standing tall against those who would destroy all you cherish. To face the monsters of the world with courage and honour, as befits all humans.

[From.GetTitledName] speaks of the harvest and the importance of the peasantry to the realm. [From.GetSheHe] also speaks of the coming winter and the time of reflections it brings. It is time to cast sorrow and regrets aside, lest you take them into it.

[From.GetTitledName] speaks of how alone the forsaken are, of how it seems the entire world is out to get you. And that, despite this, you need to keep going. Through determination, through will, you will prevail.

[From.GetTitledName] speak of how hate of the world for your people. Of how they treat you like monsters. Of the Scourge that sought to enslave you. [From.GetSheHe] reminds you that vengeance will be yours, and none shall stand in your way.
[From.GetTitledName] attempts to make a speech, only to stutter and stand in awkward silence, at a loss for words.
[From.GetTitledName] speaks of how meaningless everything is, of how life sometimes seems like you are just rushing headlong into oblivion, and nothing you will ever do matters.
[From.GetTitledName] burns the wickerman.
You take a torch and set the huge wickerman on fire. It represents all sorrows and regrets, to be burned away before the coming of winter. Hallow's End is over.
Until next year.
[From.GetTitledName] takes a torch and sets the huge wickerman on fire. It represents all sorrows and regrets, to be burned away before the coming of winter. Hallow's End is over.
Paint your face with the ashes.
Join [Root.GetTitledName] in war.
[Root.GetTitledName] is being attacked by inhuman foes! Humanity must stand together!

To the [GetFromRootCompliment] [Root.GetTitledName]/n/nIt has been brought to my attention that you find yourself in a state of war. You may worry yourself with it no longer, for [From.PrimaryTitle.GetName] comes to your aid./n/nSigned,/n[From.GetTitledName]
Send youth to knights
Send [Root.GetBestName] to train with the knights of the realm.
Dalaran's Council of Six is its ruling body, composed of six powerful mages that rule the city-state and its inhabitants.
